pos review: The receptionist was very nice and helpful.
neg review: The room and bathroom are a bit small.
very beautiful neighbourhood,  large and lovely garden,excellent breakfast with a lots of variety.

Floors are wood and old and every step made a cracking sound and beds as well, toilett makes really loud noise when flushing, when bus passes the entire room shakes, and temperature not able to control.

pos review: Location in a quiet street. Great service.

french speaking reception
-very friendly staff
-location
-parking available (12.5 eur per day)
neg review: Our room was a twin bed on last floor nearby the lift and next to the room broom closets so it was very noisy but not their fault if hotel walls are thin :)

pos review: Big room with big and comfortable bed. Lovely backyard

This is the second time we have visited and have enjoyed just relaxing and strolling through de panne..The hotel does need a little attention in some areas but on the whole a warm welcome feel. The weather wasn't on our side this visit so we played monopoly in the bar with our 13year old,one afternoon he loved it! Complimentary crisps with our Belgium beers and coke. Very cosy bar area. Lovely breakfast in the morning an overall lovely stay. Xx
